lead_paragraph: After watching the Los Angeles Lakers set a season high in points in a half, knock down 12 of 18 3-pointers and seize a 73-59 advantage at intermission, Hornets coach Steve Clifford was unusually calm at halftime.

headline.print_headline: Walker Leads Hornets Past Hot-Shooting Lakers, 117-113
headline.main: Walker Leads Hornets Past Hot-Shooting Lakers, 117-113
